offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
FO - Fine
Fined £100.10, FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £90.02, AEOC - Attachment of earnings order
Attachment of Earnings Order made.
COLLO - Collection order
Collection order made. Attachment of earnings.
RINSTL - Reserve Terms Instalments only
Reserve Terms Instalments only. £113.00 to be paid monthly from 11/12/2025
offenceResults.offenceTitle: Care worker cause mentally disordered person to watch a sexual act - SOA 2003

offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
FO - Fine
Fined £900.10
COEW - Community order England / Wales
Community order made. The defendant must comply with the requirements (shown below) by 11/12/2025. 
UPWR - Unpaid work. Requirement to be completed within 12 months.
Unpaid Work Requirement: Carry out unpaid work for 20 Hours within the next twelve months. This work will be supervised by the responsible officer.
offenceResults.offenceTitle: Provide money / property for use in acts of terrorism
Attempt to cause a male aged 13 or over to engage in sexual activity - no penetration
